posts.name: Azhaan Pary
posts.cooked:
I do not have Excel 365.
Could anyone please help me compute this.

Let’s make sure you can write formulas in Excel. Type this formula into Excel. (It won’t work in Google Sheets)
This needs Excel 365 , not older versions of Excel. Most of the course features won’t need Excel 365, but for this question, you need a friend who has Excel 365 if you don’t.

=SUM(TAKE(SORTBY({5,0,14,3,2,9,9,7,15,5,2,8,4,15,14,6}, {10,9,13,2,11,8,16,14,7,15,5,4,6,1,3,12}), 1, 10))

posts.name: Rajat Goel
posts.cooked:
23f2005121:

you need a friend who has Excel 365 if you don’t.

You need a friend or some intelligence, what i did was i created an account on office.com and you can use online office 365 absolutely free

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Azhaan,
I have verified that the office 365 free version actually does work.
Make sure you have carefully pasted the formula.
Typically Excel also tells you what the error is. Select the cell and click in the area right of the fx to see if it gives you a clue on what the problem is.
Kind regards
